news.title: Fears AI factcheckers on X could increase promotion of conspiracy theories
news.summary: Former UK minister says platform is ‘leaving it to bots to edit the news’ Elon Musk’s X social media platform to enlist artificial intelligence chatbots to draft factchecks.

news.title: Tesla vehicle deliveries drop sharply as Musk backlash affects demand
news.summary: Tesla said it delivered 384,122 vehicles in the second quarter, down 13.5% from 443,956 units a year ago. Analysts had expected it to report deliveries of about 394,378 vehicles.

news.title: AI helps find formula for paint to keep buildings cooler
news.summary: New coatings can keep buildings between 5C and 20C cooler than normal paint. They could also be applied to cars, trains, electrical equipment and other objects that will require more cooling.

news.title: Google undercounts its carbon emissions, report finds
news.summary: Research says Google’s carbon emissions went up by 65% between 2019-2024, not 51% as the tech giant had claimed. Google set a lofty goal of achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2030. Yet in the years since then, the company has moved in the opposite direction as it invests in energy-intensive artificial intelligence.

news.title: Women behind the lens: bending over backwards for luck
news.summary: Colombian artist and photographer Isabella Madrid explores the ‘click to be saved’ economy of hope in her project, Lucky Girl Syndrome.
